solution_line_template: Half of the {total_practice_hours}-hour practice is for running and weightlifting, so the time for running and weight lifting is {half_fraction} * {total_practice_hours} hours = <<{total_practice_hours}*{half_fraction}={running_weightlifting_hours}>>{running_weightlifting_hours} hour.

Thus x = {running_weightlifting_minutes}/{total_parts_for_time_division} = <<{running_weightlifting_minutes}/{total_parts_for_time_division}={weightlifting_minutes}>>{weightlifting_minutes} minutes spent weight lifting.
